channel.title: Fiddler on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in Fiddler on DefinIT

item.title: vRealize Orchestrator (vRO/vCO) â€“ Troubleshooting SOAP operations
item.description: Recently, I’ve had a bit of a SOAP baptism of fire - the project I am working on makes hundreds of SOAP calls to multiple SOAP APIs on multiple hosts. During this time I’ve encountered some common and rare problems and troubleshooting them seems to be a bit of a black art, if the number of results in Google is any measure. To demonstrate some of these troubleshooting methods I will use a global weather SOAP service, http://www.
